topic.title: Managing a database from the Command Line

body.p: This topic describes database management tasks that can be performed on the command line.
For a comprehensive list of Trove commands, see Database service command line client.

section.title: Security Groups
section.p: This section describes how to apply security rules to security groups. Security groups cannot be created through the Trove interface; you must create security groups either through the Horizon interface, or by using Neutron or Nova commands.

p.b: Add a security group rule to an instance

section.p: The following command adds a security group rule to an instance:
section.codeblock: trove secgroup-add-rule <security_group> <IP range in CIDR format>
